content.text:
# Zwartberg Airfield

| pushpin_map  = Belgium
| pushpin_label= EBZW
| pushpin_map_caption = Location in Belgium
| metric-rwy   = Y
| r1-number = 03L/21R
| r1-length-m = 799
| r1-surface  = Asphalt
| r2-number = 03R/21L
| r2-length-m = 655
| r2-surface  = Grass
| footnotes  = Note: Runway 03R/21L has no ICAO markings. Sources: Belgian AIP
}}
Zwartberg Airfield  is a public use airport located  north-northeast of Genk, Limburg, Belgium. It was built in the 1950s.
See also
* List of airports in Belgium
References
External links
*
* [http://aerobaticsweb.org/cgi-bin/search_apt?EBZW Airport record for Zwartberg Airfield]  at Landings.com
